metadata.description: Unified tarot reading dataset with both standard and custom spreads

readings.question: I've been feeling creatively stuck for months. What's really blocking me?
Everyone expects me to be grateful for my stable life, but I feel empty. Why?
I keep attracting partners who are emotionally unavailable. What pattern am I missing?
I'm 32 and considering leaving my teaching career to become a therapist. How will this unfold?
My father passed six months ago and I'm still struggling. What's my grief journey looking like?
I've been single for three years after a painful divorce. What's next for my love life?
I'm thinking about moving back to my hometown after 10 years in the city. Is this wise?
My teenage daughter and I have been fighting constantly. How can our relationship evolve?
I'm 45 and feeling invisible at work while younger colleagues advance. What's my path forward?
My best friend borrowed $3000 six months ago and keeps avoiding the topic. What should I do?
I discovered my partner has been lying about their drinking. How do I handle this?
My aging mother wants to move in with us, but my spouse is resistant. What's the best approach?
I'm being pressured to take on my boss's responsibilities without a promotion. How should I respond?
I've been having panic attacks and my doctor says it's just stress. What do I really need to know?
I'm successful by every measure but feel spiritually bankrupt. How do I find meaning again?
Since turning 40, I feel disconnected from my body and purpose. What needs attention?
Should I leave my marriage? We're not fighting, but there's no passion left.
I got into my dream PhD program, but it means five more years of poverty. Is it worth it?
My company offered me a transfer to London, but my elderly parents need me here. What should I weigh?
Should I tell my adult children about their father's affair from 20 years ago?
I'm the executor of my late aunt's estate and my siblings are fighting over everything. How do I navigate this?
I think my 16-year-old is experimenting with drugs, but I have no proof. What's really happening here?
My startup is failing and I'm running out of savings. Should I pivot or fold?
I've been offered a job that pays twice my salary but requires constant travel. What am I not seeing?
My husband wants another child but I'm secretly relieved our fertility struggles mean it might not happen. What's true for me?
My partner and I have completely different parenting styles and it's affecting our kids. How do we resolve this?
I think I'm in love with my best friend, but they're married. What do I need to understand about this situation?
My adult son is in an abusive relationship but won't listen to family concerns. How should we approach this?
My business partner and I used to be friends, but now we can barely work together. Can this be saved?
I'm torn between my high-achieving career and my desire to be more present for my young children. How do I integrate these parts of myself?
I inherited my family's business but have zero interest in running it. My siblings are furious about my hesitation. What's the wise path?
My 22-year-old moved back home after college and seems depressed and directionless. How can I help without enabling?
I'm considering leaving my religious community after 30 years due to changing beliefs. What should I know about this transition?
My spouse and I are caring for both sets of aging parents while raising teenagers. We're burning out. What needs to shift?
I suspect my business mentor has been stealing my ideas and presenting them as their own. How do I handle this betrayal?
I'm 55 and want to completely change careers, but everyone says I'm too old. What's really true about this desire?
I've been struggling with anxiety and depression for two years since my miscarriage. How do I rebuild my life?
My spouse of 15 years came out as transgender. I love them but don't know if I can navigate this transition. What's my path?
I'm considering whistleblowing on serious ethical violations at my company, knowing it will end my career. What do I need to understand?
I discovered I was adopted at age 35 and my entire family kept it secret. How do I process this revelation and move forward?
I keep having the same recurring dream about being chased. What is my subconscious trying to tell me?

spread_config.name: Inner Messenger
spread_config.description: A 4-card spread for understanding recurring dreams and subconscious messages

positions.name: The Dream Symbol
positions.short_description: What the recurring element represents in your psyche
positions.detailed_description: What does the recurring symbol, character, or scenario in your dream represent about your inner landscape? This card reveals the archetypal or personal meaning of the dream imagery and what aspect of your psyche is trying to communicate through this symbol.

positions.name: The Message
positions.short_description: What your subconscious is trying to communicate
positions.detailed_description: What important message, insight, or guidance is your subconscious mind trying to deliver through this recurring dream? This card reveals the core communication from your deeper wisdom that wants to reach your conscious awareness.

positions.name: The Fear/Resistance
positions.short_description: What you're avoiding or running from in waking life
positions.detailed_description: What fear, responsibility, truth, or change are you unconsciously avoiding or resisting in your daily life? This card illuminates what the 'chase' in your dream represents - what part of yourself or your life you're running from rather than facing.

positions.name: Integration
positions.short_description: How to work with this message in waking life
positions.detailed_description: How can you consciously integrate this subconscious wisdom into your daily life? What practical steps, mindset shifts, or conscious actions will help you work with rather than against the energy your dreams are revealing?

readings.question: I feel called to quit my corporate job and become a yoga teacher, but I have a mortgage and kids. Is this practical wisdom or midlife crisis?

spread_config.name: Soul vs Security
spread_config.description: A 6-card spread for navigating the tension between authentic calling and practical security

positions.name: The Calling
positions.short_description: The spiritual/authentic pull you're feeling
positions.detailed_description: What is the true nature of this calling or desire for change? This card reveals whether this impulse comes from genuine soul guidance, creative expansion, or authentic life purpose. What deeper part of yourself is asking to be expressed?

positions.name: The Fear
positions.short_description: What practical concerns are holding you back
positions.detailed_description: What practical fears, security concerns, or responsibilities are creating resistance to this change? This card illuminates the legitimate practical considerations as well as any limiting beliefs about money, security, or worthiness that may be influencing your decision.

positions.name: Current Foundation
positions.short_description: What you'd be leaving behind - the real value
positions.detailed_description: What does your current situation actually provide beyond just financial security? This card reveals the true value, skills, connections, or stability you've built that you'd be releasing, helping you understand what you're really giving up.

positions.name: Hidden Costs
positions.short_description: What this change would really require from you
positions.detailed_description: What would this transition actually demand of you beyond the obvious financial sacrifice? This card reveals the hidden challenges, personal growth required, or unexpected difficulties that come with following this calling.

positions.name: Hidden Gifts
positions.short_description: What this change would really offer you
positions.detailed_description: What unexpected benefits, opportunities, or forms of abundance could emerge from making this change? This card reveals the hidden gifts and possibilities that aren't obvious when you're focused on practical concerns.

positions.name: Wise Action
positions.short_description: How to honor both soul and security
positions.detailed_description: What approach would allow you to honor your authentic calling while also being responsible to your practical needs? This card provides guidance for a path that doesn't require you to choose between soul and security.

readings.question: My ex-husband wants to reconnect 'for the kids,' but I sense ulterior motives. What's really happening here?

spread_config.name: Beneath the Surface
spread_config.description: A 5-card spread for uncovering hidden motives and navigating trust issues

positions.name: Their Surface
positions.short_description: What they're presenting or saying openly
positions.detailed_description: What is this person openly presenting as their motivation, reason, or intention? This card reveals the conscious or stated agenda they're putting forward - what they want you to believe about their motivations.

positions.name: Their Hidden
positions.short_description: Their real motivations or hidden agenda
positions.detailed_description: What are their actual motivations, needs, or agenda that they may not be consciously aware of or willing to admit? This card reveals the deeper psychological or emotional drivers behind their actions.

positions.name: Your Intuition
positions.short_description: What your gut is telling you
positions.detailed_description: What is your intuitive wisdom picking up about this situation that your logical mind might be dismissing? This card validates and clarifies the subtle energetic information you're receiving about this person's true intentions.

positions.name: The Dynamic
positions.short_description: What's really happening between you energetically
positions.detailed_description: What is the actual energetic or psychological dynamic at play between you two? This card reveals the real relationship pattern, power dynamic, or emotional undercurrent that's driving this interaction.

positions.name: Wise Response
positions.short_description: How to protect yourself while staying open
positions.detailed_description: How can you respond in a way that protects your boundaries and well-being while remaining open to legitimate connection? This card provides guidance for navigating this situation with both wisdom and compassion.

readings.question: I've been estranged from my brother for five years over a political disagreement. Should I reach out for our mother's sake?

spread_config.name: Family Wounds & Wisdom
spread_config.description: A 7-card spread for navigating family estrangement and healing decisions

positions.name: The Original Wound
positions.short_description: What really broke the connection beyond the surface disagreement
positions.detailed_description: What deeper hurt, pattern, or fundamental difference lies beneath the surface disagreement that caused this estrangement? This card reveals the real wound that the political disagreement triggered or exposed.

positions.name: Your Part
positions.short_description: Your role in creating or maintaining this dynamic
positions.detailed_description: What have you contributed to this estrangement through your actions, reactions, or unconscious patterns? This card reveals your responsibility in the dynamic without blame, helping you see where you have power to change things.

positions.name: Their Part
positions.short_description: Their role in creating or maintaining this dynamic
positions.detailed_description: What patterns, fears, or unconscious dynamics is your brother contributing to this estrangement? This card helps you understand their perspective and motivations without excusing harmful behavior.

positions.name: Cost of Silence
positions.short_description: What happens if nothing changes - the price of continued estrangement
positions.detailed_description: What are the real costs to you, your family, and your brother if this estrangement continues? This card reveals what is lost or damaged by maintaining the current separation.

positions.name: Cost of Action
positions.short_description: What reaching out would require from you emotionally and practically
positions.detailed_description: What would it actually cost you emotionally, psychologically, or practically to reach out? This card reveals what you'd need to risk, release, or face to take the first step toward reconnection.

positions.name: Collateral Impact
positions.short_description: How this estrangement affects other family members
positions.detailed_description: How is this estrangement impacting your mother and other family members? This card reveals the ripple effects of your family dynamic and how others are being affected by this separation.

positions.name: Path of Love
positions.short_description: The most loving action for all involved
positions.detailed_description: What action would serve the highest good of everyone involved, including yourself? This card provides guidance on the path that honors love while respecting boundaries and acknowledging reality.

readings.question: I'm attracted to someone 15 years younger and question my motivations. What am I really seeking?

spread_config.name: Beneath the Surface
spread_config.description: A 5-card spread for uncovering hidden motives and navigating trust issues

positions.name: Their Surface
positions.short_description: What they represent or offer on the surface level
positions.detailed_description: What does this person represent to you on a surface level? What obvious qualities, energy, or experiences do they seem to offer? This card reveals what initially attracts you about them on a conscious level.

positions.name: Their Hidden
positions.short_description: What you're unconsciously seeking through them
positions.detailed_description: What deeper need, missing piece, or aspect of yourself are you unconsciously trying to access through this person? This card reveals what you're really seeking that has little to do with them as an individual.

positions.name: Your Intuition
positions.short_description: What your deeper wisdom knows about this attraction
positions.detailed_description: What does your intuitive wisdom understand about the real nature of this attraction? This card reveals what your deeper self knows about whether this connection serves your growth or stems from unhealed patterns.

positions.name: The Dynamic
positions.short_description: What psychological pattern is playing out
positions.detailed_description: What unconscious psychological or emotional pattern is being activated through this attraction? This card reveals the deeper dynamic at play and what it might be trying to heal or repeat in your life.

positions.name: Wise Response
positions.short_description: How to honor your feelings while staying conscious
positions.detailed_description: How can you work with this attraction consciously and responsibly? This card provides guidance for honoring your feelings while maintaining awareness of power dynamics, motivations, and potential consequences.

readings.question: My teenage daughter wants to live with her father instead of me. How do I handle this rejection without damaging our relationship?

spread_config.name: Love & Letting Go
spread_config.description: A 6-card spread for navigating parent-child rejection and healthy boundaries

positions.name: Their Need
positions.short_description: What your child is really seeking or needing
positions.detailed_description: What is your child's authentic need that this request represents? Beyond the surface desire to live elsewhere, what deeper developmental, emotional, or psychological need are they trying to meet through this choice?

positions.name: Your Fear
positions.short_description: What this rejection triggers in you personally
positions.detailed_description: What fears, wounds, or insecurities does this request activate in you as a parent and as a person? This card reveals what this situation brings up from your own childhood, sense of worth, or parenting anxieties.

positions.name: The Lesson
positions.short_description: What this situation is teaching you both
positions.detailed_description: What important life lesson or growth opportunity is embedded in this challenging situation? How is this experience serving both your development and your child's journey toward independence and self-knowledge?

positions.name: Healthy Boundaries
positions.short_description: How to love without clinging
positions.detailed_description: What would healthy, loving boundaries look like in this situation? How can you support your child's autonomy while maintaining your relationship and protecting your own emotional well-being?

positions.name: Long-term View
positions.short_description: How this serves their growth and your relationship
positions.detailed_description: How might honoring this choice serve your child's long-term development and ultimately strengthen your relationship? What positive outcomes could emerge from allowing this transition, even if it's painful now?

positions.name: Your Healing
positions.short_description: What you need to process about this experience
positions.detailed_description: What personal healing, understanding, or inner work does this situation call you to do? How can you use this experience to grow in your capacity for unconditional love and healthy detachment?

readings.question: I found a lump and I'm terrified of the biopsy results. How do I cope with this uncertainty?

spread_config.name: Facing the Unknown
spread_config.description: A 5-card spread for finding strength and wisdom during health crises and uncertainty

positions.name: The Fear
positions.short_description: What you're most afraid of in this situation
positions.detailed_description: What is the deepest fear that this health concern has awakened in you? This card helps you name and understand your terror so you can work with it consciously rather than being overwhelmed by it.

positions.name: Your Strength
positions.short_description: Inner resources and resilience you can draw upon
positions.detailed_description: What inner strength, wisdom, or resilience do you possess that can help you navigate this uncertainty? This card reveals the resources within you that you may have forgotten or underestimated in your fear.

positions.name: Support Available
positions.short_description: External help, love, and resources around you
positions.detailed_description: What support systems, loving relationships, or practical resources are available to help you through this time? This card reminds you that you don't have to face this alone and reveals help you might not be seeing.

positions.name: What You Can Control
positions.short_description: Where to focus your energy and actions
positions.detailed_description: What aspects of this situation can you actually influence or control? This card guides you toward productive action and helps you distinguish between what you can change and what you must accept.

positions.name: Trust/Surrender
positions.short_description: What you need to release to higher powers
positions.detailed_description: What do you need to surrender to forces beyond your control - whether that's medical expertise, divine timing, or the natural unfolding of life? This card guides you toward the peace that comes from healthy surrender.

readings.question: My successful business partner wants to sell our company, but it feels like betraying our shared vision. What's the deeper truth here?

spread_config.name: Partnership Crossroads
spread_config.description: A 6-card spread for navigating business partnership conflicts and vision differences

positions.name: Original Vision
positions.short_description: What you both originally dreamed and committed to
positions.detailed_description: What was the shared vision, dream, or purpose that originally brought you together in this business partnership? This card reveals the foundational energy and intention that you both once aligned with.

positions.name: Your Current Truth
positions.short_description: Where you stand now - your current relationship to the vision
positions.detailed_description: How do you currently feel about the business, the vision, and your partnership? What has changed for you, and what remains important? This card reveals your authentic current perspective.

positions.name: Their Current Truth
positions.short_description: Where your partner stands now
positions.detailed_description: What is driving your partner's desire to sell? How has their relationship to the business and original vision evolved? This card helps you understand their perspective without judgment.

positions.name: External Forces
positions.short_description: Market pressures, timing, and practical factors
positions.detailed_description: What external market conditions, timing factors, or practical pressures are influencing this decision? This card reveals the objective circumstances that may be pushing this choice beyond personal preference.

positions.name: Cost of Compromise
positions.short_description: What adapting to their wishes would require from you
positions.detailed_description: What would it actually cost you - emotionally, financially, or spiritually - to go along with selling the business? This card reveals what you'd be giving up and what it would demand of you.

positions.name: Higher Purpose
positions.short_description: What wants to emerge from this conflict for the highest good
positions.detailed_description: What new possibility, understanding, or direction wants to emerge from this conflict? How might this disagreement be serving a higher purpose for both of you and the business itself?

readings.question: I've been having an emotional affair online and feel guilty but can't stop. What's driving this behavior?

spread_config.name: Breaking Patterns
spread_config.description: A 5-card spread for understanding and breaking compulsive or self-destructive patterns

positions.name: The Need
positions.short_description: What emotional need this behavior is trying to meet
positions.detailed_description: What legitimate emotional or psychological need is this behavior attempting to fulfill? This card reveals the underlying need that's driving the compulsion, helping you understand what you're really seeking.

positions.name: The Shadow
positions.short_description: What part of yourself you're avoiding or denying
positions.detailed_description: What aspect of yourself, your life, or your feelings are you trying to escape or avoid through this behavior? This card reveals what you're running from that needs to be faced and integrated.

positions.name: The Trigger
positions.short_description: What situations or feelings activate this pattern
positions.detailed_description: What specific emotional states, situations, or triggers consistently lead you to engage in this behavior? Understanding your triggers helps you recognize the pattern before you're fully caught in it.

positions.name: The Consequence
positions.short_description: Where this path leads if unchanged
positions.detailed_description: What are the real consequences - to your relationships, self-respect, and life direction - if this pattern continues? This card shows you the trajectory you're on without judgment, but with clarity.

positions.name: Healthy Alternative
positions.short_description: How to meet that need authentically and constructively
positions.detailed_description: What healthy, authentic ways could you meet the underlying need that this behavior is trying to fulfill? This card provides guidance for redirecting your energy toward more life-affirming choices.

readings.question: I'm considering going no-contact with my narcissistic mother, but I worry about my younger siblings. What's the most loving choice?

spread_config.name: Family Wounds & Wisdom
spread_config.description: A 7-card spread for navigating family estrangement and healing decisions

positions.name: The Original Wound
positions.short_description: The foundational damage in this family relationship
positions.detailed_description: What is the core wound or pattern of harm that has developed in this family relationship? This card reveals the fundamental dynamic that has made this relationship toxic and why protection may be necessary.

positions.name: Your Part
positions.short_description: How you've participated in or enabled these dynamics
positions.detailed_description: What role have you played in these family dynamics through enabling, people-pleasing, or unconscious participation? This card helps you see your agency without self-blame.

positions.name: Their Part
positions.short_description: The harmful patterns they continue to perpetuate
positions.detailed_description: What harmful behaviors, manipulations, or patterns does this family member continue to engage in? This card validates your experience of harm without requiring you to excuse it.

positions.name: Cost of Silence
positions.short_description: What continuing contact costs you personally
positions.detailed_description: What is the real cost to your mental health, spiritual well-being, and authentic self if you continue to maintain contact? This card reveals what you sacrifice by staying in harmful dynamics.

positions.name: Cost of Action
positions.short_description: What no-contact would require you to face and release
positions.detailed_description: What would going no-contact demand of you emotionally and practically? What guilt, fear, or family programming would you need to work through to maintain healthy boundaries?

positions.name: Collateral Impact
positions.short_description: How this choice affects your siblings and family system
positions.detailed_description: How would your choice to go no-contact impact your siblings and the broader family system? This card helps you understand the ripple effects while not making you responsible for everyone's feelings.

positions.name: Path of Love
positions.short_description: How to love yourself and others through this decision
positions.detailed_description: What choice would represent the highest form of love - for yourself, your siblings, and even the harmful family member? This card guides you toward self-love that doesn't require self-sacrifice.

readings.question: What do I need to let go of?
What do I need to know about my upcoming interview?

spread_config.name: Interview Prep Spread
spread_config.description: A spread to get ready for important, stressful events like interviews. This spread can also be adapted to other stressful events and trials in your life: exams, auditions, public speaking, client pitches, etc.

positions.name: First Impression
positions.short_description: What impression do I give off?
positions.detailed_description: What energy do I naturally radiate to interviewers? What will they notice first about me when I enter the room (consciously or unconsciously)? What part of me enters the room before my words do? What story does my body language tell?

positions.name: Your Strength
positions.short_description: What is my strength or resource?
positions.detailed_description: What quality or skill is my biggest asset during this interview process? What parts of me shine under pressure? What do I already have that they need? Where does my confidence lie?

positions.name: Your Challenge
positions.short_description: What challenge faces you?
positions.detailed_description: What internal or external hurdle could trip me up during this interview? What fear, bad habit or self-inflicted blind spot could be a problem for me? What sensitive point within myself do I need to hold with care -- not force?

positions.name: Best Strategy
positions.short_description: What's the best way to approach this?
positions.detailed_description: What approach, strategy or way or preparation with maximize my chances for a good outcome and serve me best? Where should I lean in? What tool or tone will help me the most?

positions.name: Hidden Factor
positions.short_description: What am I not seeing?
positions.detailed_description: What unseen influence could shape the outcome of this interview? Is there something subtle and quiet I should watch for? What am I not being told? What is happening under the surface? Is there an invisible wild card I should know about?

positions.name: Outcome and Key Takeaway
positions.short_description: What is the likely result?
positions.detailed_description: What is the likely outcome here -- and the lesson, regardless of the result? If I zoom out after this is done, what can I take away from this experience?

positions.name: How to Calm Your Nerves (Optional)
positions.short_description: How do I soothe myself?
positions.detailed_description: What small practice, anchor or mindset will help soothe and ground me? Where does peace already exist in me? What steadiness can I bring with me into the room?
